query:
how to create a lot more ads using json ? this is so I can recommend them

here is example Ad:

currency can be EUR or MKD.
fixedPrice can be true or false.


 keep in mind that 1EUR = 60 MKD. so please use the price so it makes sense for used/second hand sells 


Please write me a json file with 10 ads. Make the ads for random categories and have the title and description make sense.

ads.title_lowercase: used mountain bike in excellent condition
